  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_113223</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_113223</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Enthalpy cycle for calcium hydroxide formation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enthalpieschleife für Kalziumhydroxidanordnung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cycle d'enthalpie pour la formation d'hydroxyde 
de calcium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciclo do enthalpy para a formação do hydroxide 
de cálcio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclo di entalpia per formazione dell'idrossido 
di calcio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύκλος ενθαλπίας για το σχηματισμό υδροξειδίου 
ασβεστίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciclo de la entalpia para la formación del 
hidróxido de calcio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the enthalpy cycle for the formation of calcium hydroxide. Hess' law states that enthalpy change for the two routes must be equal.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calcium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enthalpy change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">precipitate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">quicklime</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Enthalpieschleife für 
die Anordnung des Kalziumhydroxids. Gesetz Hess' gibt an, daß 
Enthalpieänderung für die zwei Wege gleich sein muß.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le cycle d'enthalpie 
pour la formation de l'hydroxyde de calcium. La loi de Hess 
déclare que le changement d'enthalpie pour les deux itinéraires doit
être égal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o ciclo do enthalpy para
a formação do hydroxide de cálcio. A lei de Hess' indica que 
a mudança do enthalpy para as duas rotas deve ser igual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il ciclo di entalpia 
per la formazione dell'idrossido di calcio. La legge del Hess 
dichiara che il cambiamento di entalpia per i due itinerari 
deve essere uguale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κύκλο ενθαλπίας για το 
σχηματισμό του υδροξειδίου ασβεστίου. Ο νόμος των Hess 
δηλώνει ότι η αλλαγή ενθαλπίας για τις δύο διαδρομές πρέπει να 
είναι ίση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el ciclo de la entalpia 
para la formación del hidróxido de calcio. La ley de Hess 
indica que el cambio de la entalpia para las dos rutas debe ser igual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalziumhydroxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enthalpieänderung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Niederschlag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ätzkalk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hydroxyde de calcium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changement d'enthalpie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">précipité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chaux vive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hydroxide de cálcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mudança do enthalpy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">precipitate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">quicklime</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">idrossido di calcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento di entalpia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">precipitato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calce viva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υδροξείδιο ασβεστίου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αλλαγή ενθαλπίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ίζημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">quicklime</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">hidróxido de calcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cambio de la entalpia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">precipitado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cal viva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
